mapper.select: select a.no, a.subject, a.hit, date_format(a.write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as writedate, b.name as username, a.contents, b.no as userno from board a, user b where a.user_no=b.no and a.no=#{no} order by a.no desc

select a.no, a.subject, a.hit, date_format(a.write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as writedate, b.name as username from board a, user b where a.user_no=b.no and subject like CONCAT('%', #{kwd}, '%') order by no desc
